articles.author: Emily Joshu
articles.title: Mask study published by NIH suggests N95 Covid masks may expose wearers to dangerous level of toxic compounds - Daily Mail
articles.description: A study found that several disposable masks contain more than eight times the US recommended limit of toxic volatile organic compounds (TVOCs), which can cause several health issues.
articles.content:
The surgical N95 mask has been held up as the gold standard when it comes to protecting against Covid. 
But a study quietly re-shared by the National Institutes of Health in spring suggests the tigh… [+6048 chars]
